NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Say YES to NCS
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Recently you expressed an interest in doing NCS. You can take part in this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity this February half term or, if this doesn’t fit with your plans, there are also several start dates over the summer to choose from. *
You may have seen our recent ad on TV and we’ve also produced a new film to remind you what NCS is all about….
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YEpX7Q2-CVQ
There’s lots of information on our website and you can sign up for NCS here.
http://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
If you’re interested in what other people have said about NCS, you can find us on Facebook and Twitter.
Make sure you don't miss out on the experience of a lifetime.
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services - The Challenge
*Young people need to meet our age eligibility criteria - for our February half term programme, participants must have turned 16 or 17 by 31 August 2014, for our summer programme, participants must be 16 on, or before 31 August 2015. They must not be 18 during the residential part of any programme. For more information please see the terms and conditions on our website.
VISIT THECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
